name: react-vimeo
description: React component to load video from Vimeo

scripts.build: npm run build-npm && npm run build-umd && npm run build-css
scripts.build-css: stylus --use nib lib/Vimeo.styl -o lib/ && stylus --compress --use nib lib/Vimeo.styl -o lib/Vimeo.min.css && npm run build-css-size
scripts.build-css-size: echo "gzipped, the css build is `gzip -c lib/Vimeo.min.css | wc -c | sed -e 's/^[[:space:]]*//'` bytes"
scripts.build-umd: NODE_ENV=production webpack src/Vimeo.jsx lib/umd/ReactVimeo.js && NODE_ENV=production webpack -p src/Vimeo.jsx lib/umd/ReactVimeo.min.js && npm run build-size
scripts.build-size: echo "gzipped, the umd build is `gzip -c lib/umd/ReactVimeo.min.js | wc -c | sed -e 's/^[[:space:]]*//'` bytes"
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run build
